channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- Puppet Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2023-5255|2024-09-19T19:29:30.230Z -- puppet -- puppet%20enterprise
item.description: For certificates that utilize the auto-renew feature in Puppet Server, a flaw exists which prevents the certificates from being revoked.
